name: The Craft Consulting
tagline: You. Above and Beyond the Competition.
description: The Craft is a strategic consultancy that helps clients to compete at the very highest level and build a sustainable competitive advantage in their markets. It operates in the field of Strategic Differentiation; the innovative and dynamic process. The Craft creates the opportunity for companies to enter new markets, stimulate growth, accelerate time to market, achieve value led pricing and increase share price.
